Articles.Content:
Hello all, here's a new game to try!

The point of this is to make up a cheat code, using nothing but the keyboard and mouse movements, that will complete a certain action in KSP.

**RULES**

1. Have fun!

2. No stealing other's cheat codes.

3. Cheat codes cannot be made of inappropriate phrases or words.

4. Cheat codes must be beneficial to the player!

---

**Cheat code:** Type "jebkerman" on the Options menu. If an explosion sound plays, the cheat was successful. When you return to a save game, your Kerbals will all have the BadS flag enabled.

When launching, press and hold W for exactly 5 seconds. if done correctly, you should hear and see a big booom-boom.

This cheat is good for pranks on you're soon-to-not-be-friends :3
During launch or boost, alternately press Z and X in a steady rhythm. Makes fuel last twice as long. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
In a rover press R and then hold W
Hold Up, the Turbo button, and the Steal button at takeoff. This unlocks big head mode. See kerbals with even larger/scarier craniums.
Press Esc to not die.

Up-Up-Down-Down-Left-Right-Left-Right B, A, Start

Giant Konami logo when you press Launch from the VAB
Hold T and press Z to enable "floppy joints" mode. The joints are less stiff than normal but stronger, and your ship will flop over like a Slinky on the launchpad.
If a kerbal died, hit ABBA on your keyboard. He'll be revived with a BadS flag.
Want more drones? Don't worry! Hit 4 and G at the same time! You'll hear a beep, and next time you start the game, you can pilot your very own Oblivion Drone!

Press the Abort button 10 times in a row and the ship will be recreated at its original launch configuration, with full fuel tanks!

**DISCLAIMER:** Launch clamps will cause issues, and the Abort button must be unassigned.
open the dev console using Ctrl+Shift+C and type "dragon" to transform into a dragon.
Pressing Shift and Ctrl alternately for 40 seconds straight will enable Godmode, giving the current Kerbals in your spacecraft infinite EVA crash tolerance.
Click all the buttons in a mk1 cockpit and you get a mk2 cockpit iva!
A+C+A+D+D+Q allows u to to rendezvous with any ship or orbit any planet of your liking
A+L+E+I+N+S will enable Laythe Doomsday.
Press X and T together to teleport to space
Type in "FIREWORKS" to make every part on the currently selected ship explode.
Up arrow Up arrow Down arrow Down arrow, A B, A B, esc, gives infinite kerbits in career.
Left+Right+Left+Right+typing "Headsmash" makes all the kerbals in the currently selected spacecraft smash the screens with their heads.

Step 1: Launch any manned craft (e.g Kerbal X).

Step 2: Get any kerbal out of the ship, but stay on the ladder.

Step 3: Quicksave.

Step 4: Load quicksave.

Step 5: Get back in the ship.

Ta-da! You now have a clone of the kerbal on the ladder!
Hold F4 C to crash the game.

If you wait for 15 minutes in the main menu while touching nothing (no, not even the mouse), you'll get this really awesome minigame!

I won't spoil it so go see it for yourselves!

Touching anything will reset the timer so be patient.
Building a ship that consists of only 1024 cubic octagonal struts and launching it from the runway will result in Sputnik crashing into the VAB

Hack gravity, warp, unhack, unwarp, rehack. You'll get even less gravity. It works backwards too.

(Was it supposed to be fake?)
